name: The Forest of Doom
overview: Published in the February 1984 issue of Personal Computer World magazine (PCW). The listing was for the ORIC-1 computer. A version for the Commodore 64 was published in Your Commodore magazine in February 1985 under the title of "The Forest of Evil" Ported to the BBC Micro in June 2020 by the same guy who did the C64 version. The port includes some tweaks, adjustments and general attempts at bugfixing!
